Topic.Title: How to make the words type itself in a quest game.

Posts.EditableText: Helllo. In a lot of the games I play, I see the words 'type' itself like something on a computer. How do you do that?
Posts.HTML: Helllo. In a lot of the games I play, I see the words 'type' itself like something on a computer. How do you do that?

Posts.EditableText:
TextFX_Typewriter ("Type me", 100)
Not sure if you can do that for a room description, but you can use that for any message scripts.
Posts.HTML:
TextFX_Typewriter ("Type me", 100)
Not sure if you can do that for a room description, but you can use that for any message scripts.
